row.entry: This module allows you to control how the demosaic is processed.

sect4.title: Usage
sect4.para: Demosaic is done on display only when zoom is greater than 50%.

sect5.title: edge threshold
sect5.para: Set the threshold for the median pass.

sect5.title: color smoothing
sect5.para: Number of passes for color smoothing.

sect5.title: match greens
sect5.para: Greens correction, useful for some camera.
